targets.query: SELECT max("upper") AS "upper" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.raft.leader.lastContact" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)

SELECT max("usage_user") AS "user_cpu", max("usage_iowait") AS "iowait_cpu" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND ("role" = 'consul-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(max("read_bytes")) + non_negative_difference(max("write_bytes")) AS "disk" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND ("role" = 'consul-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(max("bytes_recv")) + non_negative_difference(max("bytes_sent")) AS "bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND ("role" = 'consul-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT count(tot) FROM (SELECT max("uptime") AS "tot" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."system" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY "host")
SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY ON "telegraf" FROM "consul.rpc.request" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "role" = 'consul-server' AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("value") AS "count" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.rpc.request" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" FILL(null)

SELECT max("value") AS "alloc_bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.runtime.alloc_bytes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" FILL(null)

SELECT max("value") AS "sys_bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.runtime.sys_bytes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" FILL(null)

SELECT max("total") AS "total_bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/ AND "role" = 'consul-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") AS "count" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.raft.apply" WHERE "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT max("value") AS "commit_time_ms" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.raft.commitTime" WHERE ("role" = 'consul-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("mean") AS "mean", max("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.txn.apply" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("mean") AS "mean", max("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.txn.apply" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("mean") AS "mean", max("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.txn.apply" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(null)

SELECT last("upper")/1000000 AS "milliseconds" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.runtime.gc_pause_ns" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY host, time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("count") AS count FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul.kvs.apply" WHERE ("datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("mean") AS time_ms FROM "autogen"."consul.kvs.apply" WHERE ("datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values on telegraf from cpu with key = "host" where role = 'consul-server'

list.label: Datacenter
list.name: dc
list.query: show tag values on telegraf from cpu with key = "datacenter" where role = 'consul-server'
